snippet.title: T H E W O R L D H A S C O M E T O A N E N D (SUPER MARIO 64: CHAOS EDITION Release Trailer
snippet.description:
For more fangames, subscribe to this channel!
https://www.youtube.com/c/KazeEmanuar?sub_confirmation=1

I modified the original SM64 to randomly patch [old cheat device] Gameshark codes I found on the Internet (or made myself) to the game. This resulted in a pretty funny, instable and frustrating game. Don't take this too serious and don't try to get any progress done in the game. You won't

download:
https://mega.nz/#!bDATxIBD!OPfXrsRXwmne9GtH-35OWyTPay9_ILY-Vbz1uXJhiUc

to play this, download an N64 emulator (i recommend Project 64 1.6) and open the given file with it.

Note the following things:
-if you softlock, wait ~20 seconds and you will most likely unlock.
-the game will crash sometimes, so yeah... SURPRISE GAMEOVER!!

(i havent fixxed every crash as it would be way too much work with all the GSCs - i didnt really want to waste much time on this funmod)


09/11/2014 updated it for less crashes

For more SM64 mods or if you just feel like supporting me for my work, look at my other videos and/or subscribe to my channel.


FAQ:
Can you do this for other N64 games?
I probably could, but it requires learning about the game and some effort, so i won't be doing that, since i don't like the other N64 games.
